Sale price$145.00 USD Regular price(/)

The Bryce men's lace-up, inspired by the striking landscapes of Bryce Canyon National Park, combines timeless design with eco-friendly materials. Its upper is crafted from innovative mushroom leather, offering a sustainable yet stylish option for a rugged and refined look.

Men's Bryce Lace Up - Mushroom Leather Sale price$145.00 USD Regular price(/)

Mushroom Leather

Also known as mycelium (the root system of mushrooms), and is farmed without using fertilizers making this material biodegradable and compostable.

1Knot™ Construction

Kengos are hand made and assembled without the use of petroleum based adhesives.

Agave Based Mid-Sole

Kengos utilizes the biomass (waste) left over from the tequila manufacturing process to comprise the mid-sole of all Kengos shoes.

PureFlex™ Rubber

PureFlex™ is a natural rubber decomposes 30x faster than industry standards.

Our Goal

Kengos was founded in 2019 to create the world's most sustainable shoes. This mission comes to life through a 4 part philosophy, we call - “The Kengos Way":

  • Simplify with smart design
  • Maximize plant-based materials
  • Eliminate harmful petrochemicals
  • Prioritize planet earth
Materials:

The Bryce shoe features an upper made from responsibly sourced mushroom leather. Its midsole is constructed from agave foam, a sustainable byproduct of tequila production, while the outsole uses PureFlex™ natural rubber for optimal flexibility and durability. Named after Bryce Canyon National Park, this shoe combines style and eco-friendliness.

Construction:

The upper and lower parts of the shoe are hand-laced together, avoiding the use of glue and ensuring lasting quality. This hand-crafted process is our patented 1Knot™ Construction.

Sizing Suggestions:

Mushroom leather is a great sustainable upper, but it can feel a little snug! We recommend selecting the next size up from you usual size when ordering mushroom leather products.

Care Instructions:

The cleaning recommendation for mushroom leather requires using warm water to dampen a cloth. You can then wash the shoes by hand cleaning any dirt and allowing to air dry in the sun. DO NOT WASH IN WASHING MACHINE. DO NOT PLACE KENGOS IN THE DRYER.

Plant based footwear that is good for the soul.

About

We believe in making shoes that look good, feel good, and do good for the planet. From sourcing local materials to crafting quality design, each step of our process is a step forward for the footwear industry.
